name: percolate
content:
percolate verb
(LIQUID)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] If a liquid percolates, it moves slowly through a substance with very small holes in it: Sea water percolates down through the rocks.
[ I or T ] to make coffee using a machine in which hot water passes through crushed coffee beans into a container below
